channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21511] beeline -f report no such file if file is not on local fs
item.description:
I test like this

HQL=hdfs://hacluster/tmp/ff.hql

if hadoop fs -test -f ${HQL}

then

       beeline -f ${HQL}

fi

test ${HQL} ok, but beeline report ${HQL} no such file or directory
item.summary: beeline -f report no such file if file is not on local fs

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The root cause issue of HIVE-19034 still exists on the latest versions.Tracking here.

+1
patch 1 had a green run; patch 2 only added a new test (which is also passing)

this will also need to be documented in the wiki(added todoc label):
https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/HiveServer2+Clients (search for -f <file>)
hive-cli documentation contained some examples(search for hdfs):
https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/LanguageManual+Cli
pushed to master. Thank you bpusztahazi!
